summary: SOOT NOTED IN THE CABIN OF MY MOTORHOME WITH CLEANING. THIS IS A PRODUCT OF COMBUSTION FROM MY DIESEL ENGINE. NO WINDOW WERE OPEN SO IT IS LEAKING IN THE CABIN. IF SOOT IS LEAKING THAN CARBON MONOXIDE IS ALSO ENTERING THE MOTORHOME. SECONDLY A CABINET WAS INSTALLED OVER A FLEXIBLE HEATING DUCT FROM MY GAS FURNACE THAT WAS COMPLETELY OBSTRUCTED THAT WOULD POTENTIALLY CAUSE A FIRE IF THE HEATER WAS USED.
